page.title: 07Chapel Copse, Whiteparish
page.content: Situated at{Eastern edge of Morrisholt {farm.}Mainly chalk - encloses chalk pit.{Hazel recently used for hurdles {for Highgrove House Glocs., (Prince {Charles). Spring }- a mass of bluebells.{We found}Wood Spurge,Ground ivy, Dogs Mercury, Enchanter's Nightshade, Scotch Thistle, Milk Thistle, Wild Garlic, Burdock, Nipplewort, Butchers Broom, Lords & Ladies, Fern, Bramble (in hedge), Red Dead Nettle (Hemp D.N.), Charlock, Herb Robert & Common Mustard.{Trees - Hazel, Holly, Ash, Hawthorn, Field Maple & some Cherry. These were all observed in 1 hour. The site is enclosed by pasture land.{"Chapel - {Field"}has red brick foundations adjoining the copse. This MAY be the site of an old Chapel. There is also a dilapidated well at the far side of the field. (9-11 yrs. Children).
